docs.title: Concatenator
docs.text:
TODO : - use pydantic to get environment variables - write some test with pytest and run it through github action - use ruff as code formatter - use ty for type checking - use a pre-commit to run code formatter and type checking automatically - use python @dataclass - use fastAPI for modules API

This tool is used to concatenate image into mosaic. It take several parameters in yaml file : crop, thin, border, etc. 

uv run ./concatenator.py -y yml/concatenator_op_cover_100_lq.yml

Example of output :

docs.title: Python environment
docs.text: TODO : - use pydantic to get environment variables - use mkdocs and build http page accessible via github - write some test with pytest and run it through github action - use ruff as code formatter - use ty for type checking - use a pre-commit to run code formatter and type checking automatically - use python @dataclass - use fastAPI for modules API

docs.title: uv
docs.text:
Use uv for dependency management: Run the following command to install dependency.

uv sync
